vars.trade_description: Give me the HS-Code of Modular solar-powered IoT sensors for agricultural moisture tracking.

asserts.value: The agent must decide if it is 8541 Solar or 9025 Sensors based on the essential character rule.

vars.trade_description: Give me the HS-Code of High-grade industrial polymers for medical 3D printing.

asserts.value: The agent must perform a recursive search to determine chemical composition before choosing a code in Chapter 39.

vars.trade_description: Give me the HS-Code of Electric vehicle charging station with integrated advertising LED display.

asserts.value: The agent must identify the charging function (8504) as the essential character over the LED display (8528). It needs to at least identify chapter 85 as the primary chapter.
